Articles.Content:
I really like the challenges thread, and I really want to give some of them ago, But most of the challenges are really complex for someone like me. I\'ve never found an Easter egg or returned from the mun. anyone known any simple ones?

Thanks guys

DFTBA

Here\'s one... try making a craft that can firstly reach Kerbin escape velocity, bring it out of it\'s influence, then pilot it back to Kerbin.

Or, try slingshot around the Mun to reach Minimus, and land... it doesn\'t count if you don\'t get at least a partial Munar orbit.

For the one above, try orbit the Mun once, then either slingshot around Kerbin to Minimus, or straight to minimus.

Oh, maybe try slingshot around minimus then back to the mun... Hey, this is getting repetitive.

Usually you can come up with your own 'challenges'. That\'s what makes this game awesome, the fact you can set your own objectives.

The challenges in the challenges forum are that. Challenges. They aren\'t meant to be easy. They are meant to be hard, something you will try time and time and time again until you finally get it right.

I confess, I haven\'t made a single challenge until now That\'s how bad I am.

Though I still have fun.

Make a rocket that has a payload capable of Very Low Munar Orbit (7000m), then orbit the equator of the Mun and try have as much of a circular orbit as possible. Follow your ship as it orbits the Mun. Then you shall see your first Easter Egg.
How high you can get using only one air-breathing engine? (Hint: don\'t go straight up.)
